questions.question: In bending equation M/I = f/y = E/R

answers.a: (A) Knowing deflection y experimentally, E can be found
answers.b: (B) By knowing value of E, theoretical value of y can be computed

questions.question: Is extensometer required in bending test of mild steel
Which of the following is most elastic

answers.a: When there is internal shear acting in mid-span of specimen
answers.b: When there is internal shear acting in quarter span of specimen
answers.c: When there is no internal shear acting in quarter span of specimen
answers.d: When there is no internal shear acting in mid-span of specimen

questions.question: Computation of bending stress using formula f/y = M/I. This formula is valid within elastic limit only.(Say True or False)
Write suitable answer, Failure of mild steel specimen in bending test is
